message.content:
cs.CL, cs.DL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.SI. 

The paper uses text analysis to investigate the organization and evolution of scientific fields, which suggests that it is likely to belong to the Natural Language Processing (cs.CL), Deep Learning (cs.DL), Information Retrieval (cs.IR), Machine Learning (cs.LG), or Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) sub-categories of arXiv CS. The use of an information-theoretic measure of linguistic similarity and the analysis of almost 20M papers from the past three decades suggest a focus on language and data analysis, which aligns with these sub-categories.
